dialog: Hey, so I’m not about to become a regular around here or anything...
but last time I came by,
nobody made fun of me for eating seeds.
That's actually happened to me before, y'know.
Like the time I had a sesame seed bagel
or a poppy seed muffin
or a bag of sunflower seeds.
Seeds got me messed up man.
Anyways.
So two orders of sashimi.
I swear, if you're putting seeds on my order...
Thanks
You guys are the best.
SEEDS.
SEEDS EVERYWHERE.
UGH.
DISGUSTING.
So, here’s a fun fact about frogs...
We can cough up our stomachs to clean ‘em and put ‘em back in
Not to say your food's like filthy or anything
I just thought you might find it cool.
That’s okay...
...I’d like a salmon roll and an order of sashimi
Hey, wanna know another fun fact while we wait???
Did you know I can wash my intestines?
Wanna see?
Okay...
Thanks!
I’ll take my talents somewhere they’re appreciated!
Good afternoon.
Can I get three poke bowls?
One for me and my... friends.
My friends are getting hungry...
And so am I.
Mmm. Thanks!
My friends?
Uh, duh.
Me, myself, and I.
Take care!
We’re too hungry to keep waiting...
We're gonna check out another place down the street
We as in me, myself and I.
Hello sir!!
I’m excited for our big game tomorrow!
I hope you guys will be open so my mom can try some of your food!!
I tell her about you guys all the time!!
Anyways, I'll have a salmon roll please!
Hey sir,
it’s getting a bit past my bedtime...
so I might have to head home soon...
Thank you yet again, sir!
See you after our big game tomorrow!
The game’s gonna be so big!
So, I really need to leave and get sleep!
Sorry, about leaving, but...
Have a good night!
Rough week, huh?
I can barely imagine.
You and me both, honestly.
I’ll take a poke bowl and an order of sashimi.
You two alright back there?
Thanks. Keep the change.
You know, if this all falls apart,
God forbid.
You’re both welcome back.
I know you guys are following dreams and stuff, but
There’s no shame in saving up and giving this another shot in the future.
You know, if this all falls apart,
God forbid.
You’re both welcome back.
I know you guys are following dreams and stuff, but
There’s no shame in saving up and giving this another shot in the future.
